author: jukka
msg: JCR-2741: Improved logging for session operations

Remove MDC variables from SessionState as MDC.put is too expensive for at least small read operations. Instead of JCR API calls, we should instead look at using MDC at the level of HTTP requests, etc.

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1779 ensure session is logged out at the end of the bundle activator

author: iocanel
msg: [KARAF-172] The option names for roleDiscriminator and rolePolicy have been changed to  role.policy and role.discriminator to be coherent with the rest option names inside the login modules.

author: odeakin
msg: The testHandshake() test method needs to be in the impl tests to run, so move to SSLEngineImplTest.
